text_block_list.text: I was in my room one night, just before Nice Nature was due to face off with Tokai Teio at the big race meeting, when…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Evening! That's right, it's me! Your faithful trainee!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Sorry to bother you so late. I left something behind in the trainers' office. I couldn't borrow the key for a sec, could I?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: And I figure there's no sense in disturbing you twice, so how about I hold onto it and I'll open up in the morning too. Sound good?
choice_data_list: It's really late… let me go with you at least.
It's really late… let me go with you at least.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Eh!? Ah… um… well, the thing is…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I… it's fine, don't worry about it! Who do you think you're talking to, huh? I'm not some helpless little baby lamb over here, y'know?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: So! How about you give me that key and I'll get out of your hair.
Something seemed a little off, but I handed it over anyway.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Much obliged. Well, I'll be off then. G'night!
Then, a couple of hours later…
(<ring ring>)

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Hello? Is this Nature-san's trainer? This is Fuji Kiseki from the Ritto dormitory.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: It's an hour past curfew and she still isn't back yet. Do you have any idea where she might be?
Uh-oh. This was bad. I rushed to the office.
I ran through the dark halls of the academy, back to the trainers' office. As I approached…

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: …and it's Tokai Teio now, moving up on the outside as they enter the home straight…

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: And she's clear! Tokai Teio is away! But can she stay away? [Commentator]: SHE CAN! Tokai Teio WINS! It's Tokai Teio by two lengths!
I opened the door and sure enough, there was Nice Nature, deep in concentration, watching a video of one of Tokai Teio's recent victories.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Owww, I'm getting a stiff neck doing this…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: But still. Wow. It's just win after win after win for this girl, huh. Makes it look easy, too. Somehow she's always in the right place at the right time.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Seems like if you let her dictate the pace, that's it… you're toast. Yeesh.
choice_data_list: Were you watching Teio's race videos by yourself this whole time?
Were you watching Teio's race videos by yourself this whole time?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Waaah!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san? W… what are you doing here!?
choice_data_list: I got a phone call from Fuji Kiseki.
I got a phone call from Fuji Kiseki.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: From Fuji-san? What's she got to do with… Aaagh! Curfew!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ahh, I totally lost track of the time… ugh, I'm such an idiot!
She was obviously so focused on her research that she didn't realize how late it was.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I'm… sorry. For lying to you earlier. Here, let me give you back your key. And I'll make sure I apologize for missing curfew.
choice_data_list: You really want to beat Tokai Teio, don't you?
You really want to beat Tokai Teio, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: What!? No…! I…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: It's… it's not that.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: How many times do I have to say it? I can't… I mean… I'm just not meant to…
She trailed off, walked over to the window, and looked up at the night sky.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I'm not a big star. I wasn't made to shine like that. To be a hero… a champion…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: There was a time when I thought maybe I could. Of course there was. Otherwise, I wouldn't be here.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: But it's burned into my memory now. That feeling of pouring out everything you've got and coming up short.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: The sight of your opponent's back… getting further and further out of reach.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: All that support, the big send-off, everyone's hopes and expectations… but being here, lining up with the real stars, with real talent… I see how things are.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: That's me. Just another background character with a typical also-ran's story.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: That's all I am. I understand that better than anyone.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: So that's why you don't hear me talking about wanting to be first place, to be a champion. Kind of pathetic, huh.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
choice_data_list: You certainly put in the work like a champion.
You certainly put in the work like a champion.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: But I'm not… I can't be a champion. C'mon, Trainer-san, knock it off already…!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Really, just… give it a rest, okay?
She sounded sure… but the expression on her face told a different story.
I walked her back to the dormitories, and together we apologized to Fuji Kiseki for breaking curfew.
Then, after training the next day…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: So, um… trainer-san… is it alright if I do a little more video research after this?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Don't get any weird ideas. Like, "ooh, she's all fired up to face off with Teio!", or anything like that…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: But… y'know…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Even if I'm not going to win, I still want to put up a decent fight. You know, make it a contest, at least.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Okay! Shall we?
And so we squeezed every ounce of preparation we could into the final days before the big tournament.
